name: Wasted Wharf
description:
Don't go towards the light

You are Kyle Anderson, a detective who, while investigating strange reports from a small sea-town, is dragged into something much more than he bargained for.

A mysterious force has taken over the wharf and transformed the inhabitants into bloodthirsty monsters. Now Kyle must kill these creatures to release their souls and open the gates to escape this Wasted Wharf.

Featuring stealth based gameplay and a creepy, desolate atmosphere, Wasted Wharf will provide a challenge and a feeling of dread, as you never know what might be around the corner...

Controls

WASD to Move

Mouse to Look

Ctr to Crouch

Shift to Sprint

Right Click for Distraction Beam
